value:
Isn't it kind of scary never knowing
what may come through that
summoning gate?$k$pHuh? I've been the scariest thing to
come through so far?

I was a border guard before coming
here. And before that, I lived in a
farming village.$k$pGoes to show, you never know where
your life will take you next until
you're there.

You can't fight, but you aren't afraid
of battle. You've got a strong spirit.

I've made friends with the animals
living nearby. Maybe you'd like to...
take a walk with me and meet them?

I made some more charms. Enough
for everyone. I want to make sure
everyone makes it home safely.

Thanks for coming to greet me. I have
a message for the summoner on
behalf of $Nf.

Is it OK for me to get this much
stronger?
This is nice.

Maybe it's time I made myself a
new good-luck charm.

Thank you. The stronger I get, the
better I can protect everyone.

I'm Benny, a border guard from Nohr.
I hope you aren't scared of me,
because I'd like to make friends.

Oh, it's you. You always take the time
to talk to me... You aren't scared of
me like the others.$k$pI know I have "one of those faces."
It's led to all sorts of rumors
spreading about me back home.$k$pPeople claim that I once tossed a
man so high into the sky, he never
came back down.$k$pAnd just the other day, I overheard
someone say my battle cry could
shut the gateways for good.$k$pCommander Anna even paid me a
visit to remind me to save it for the
battlefield!$k$pBut the truth is, I don't have that sort
of power. The sort of power I do have
is that to protect my friends.$k$pAnd it's all thanks to you and the time
we spent together. Thanks for being
brave, $Nu.
むんっ！
うおおっ！
うおっ！
Argh...
Here goes nothing.
You don't scare me.
Don't you come near me.
Sorry about this.
Stay safe...everybody...
Yes
I brought a lot of good-luck charms with me.
When I was summoned, I thought I was headed to the other side...
Who...who's there? Oh. It's just you. You scared me.
I like animals. They aren't scared of me.
You aren't hurt, are you? I always worry about my friends.
All of the Heroes are so brave. I need to find my courage.
If you ever find yourself in danger, just hide behind me. This is sturdy armor.
Hmm...
I'll protect you.
It's OK.
